text: Brokedown Palace is a 1999 American mystery drama movie directed by Jonathan Kaplan and starring Claire Danes, Kate Beckinsale, Bill Pullman, Lou Diamond Phillips, Jacqueline Kim, Daniel Lapaine, Paul Walker. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1999 mystery movies Category:1999 drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Kaplan Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Thailand Category:Movies set in the Philippines
title: Brokedown Palace
